title: Food club
content:
I am a foodie, Its something I wanna do for fun. Even though Ive watched cookery shows for years, never tried cooking something  new. 

I have no cooking skills but would really love to get started, am I eligible to join ?

comments.body: Dude I graduated and still didn't know there was a food club lol
Is there a Food Club in PESU?
um, what is the name of this *food club*?
